security_event_type.description: Instruction profile is missing, invalid or incompatible with the current security model.
Input is suspected to contain prompt injection or malicious instructions.
Executor attempted to use a tool or connector that is forbidden by policy.
Rate limit was exceeded for a given executor, tool or external API.
Attempt to access or exfiltrate sensitive data beyond allowed scope.
Other security-relevant event that does not fit predefined categories.

security_action_type.description: Record the event for auditing or later analysis without immediate blocking.
Send an alert to a human owner, operator or monitoring system.
Block the requested action or tool invocation.
Switch to a safer fallback behaviour (e.g. restricted mode, safe answer, or no-op).

security_policy_profile.description: Default MOVA security profile for production-like environments.
Relaxed MOVA security profile for development and experimentation.

meta.note: Core security dictionaries for MOVA 4.1. Values may be extended via namespaced ids (e.g. vendorX:custom_event).
